enable_sticky.label: Notice board fixed at the top

display_mode.label: Display style of multiple notice boards

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

open_first_collapsible_row.label: Expand the first tab by default

desktop_layout.label: Image position on PC
desktop_layout.info: Text below image by default on mobile device

m_rows.label: Lines of horizontal sliding on mobile device
m_rows.info: When enabled horizontal sliding, the columns of it will follow "Columns on mobile device", and lines of it will follow this configuration item

slice_in_mobile.label: Enable horizontal scroll to view all

image_display_area.label: Image display area
image_display_area.info: Adjust the display area of the product map

collection_title_position.label: Text position on PC
collection_title_position.info: Control the text position of each category in the category list

product_image.label: Recommended product image
product_image.info: Displayed by stacking upon category image, usually as a product image

pc_image.label: Image
pc_image.info: Image width is self-adapted and displayed according to image ratio

mobile_image.label: Image on mobile device
mobile_image.info: Use image in PC size if not uploaded, the image height will be self-adapted and displayed according to image ratio

mobile_content_align.label: Alignment of contents on mobile device

result.label: Information
result.info: Information displayed when countdown stops at 0

enable_desktop_slider.label: Slide horizontally to view on PC

enable_mobile_slider.label: Enable horizontal scroll to view all

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Display this button only if "Maximum product quantity" is less than the product quantity under this category

button_follow_endof_list.label: Display View more button on mobile device at the end of list

show_secondary_image.label: Display next product image when mouse hovers over the screen

group_header__3.label: Label toggle color
group_header__3.info: The color of other product cards can be set in "Global Settings-Color-Product"

show_next_image.label: Display next product image when mouse hovers over the screen

content_height.label: Content height
content_height.info: Set component height to change carousel height

image.label: Image on PC
image.info: Suggested size: 2880x1400px for full screen, 1440x1400px for 50% layout, 2000x1400px for 70% layout

image_mobile.label: Image on mobile device
image_mobile.info: Suggested size: 720x1500px for full screen, 720x760px for 50% layout, 720x1000px for 70% layout

subscribe_letter_placeholder.label: Prompt text in the input box

show_country_selector.label: Show country/ region selector
show_country_selector.info: You need to add at least two market items to make "Display country/region selector" effective. To add a market, please go to [Market setting](/admin/settings/markets)

show_locale_selector.label: Display the language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to Market - Language management and add at least two items of the language to make selector effective. To add the language, you can go to [Language setting](/admin/settings/lang), then go to [Market](/admin/settings/markets) - Language management page once it is completed and add the multilanguage of current market

options__0.label: At the top of copyright text

image_full_width.label: Fullscreen image displayed at the bottom

align.label: Alignment of pictures on the computer side

transparent_image.label: Transparent header LOGO
transparent_image.info: When the page header becomes transparent and a logo is configured in the theme settings, it will be displayed.

options__0.label: LOGO at the left, menu in a new line

mobile_top_menu.label: Pin-to-top menu on mobile device
mobile_top_menu.info: When configured, the menu will be fixed at the bottom of header on mobile device, and it can be switched through horizontal slides

mobile_top_menu_show_home.label: Menu pinned to top will only be displayed on home page
mobile_top_menu_show_home.info: When configured, the menu pinned to top will only be displayed on the home page

user_mobile_layout.label: Personal center position on mobile device

options__2.label: Pin to top only for sliding up

hover_show_user_menu.label: Display the drop-down box by hovering on the personal center icon on PC

show_country_selector.label: Show country/ region selector
show_country_selector.info: You need to add at least two market items to make "Display country/region selector" effective. To add a market, please go to [Market setting](/admin/settings/markets)

show_locale_selector.label: Display the language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to Market - Language management and add at least two items of the language to make selector effective. To add the language, you can go to [Language setting](/admin/settings/lang), then go to [Market](/admin/settings/markets) - Language management page once it is completed and add the multilanguage of current market
